title: Ranged Devourer Nerf
body: How do you think the nerfs to Sated Devourer, ranged champs proc phantom hit every 4th attack, will affect Kayle Jungle? Am I wrong to think that it won't impact her too much?

replies.body:
I main Kog maw jungle for 6 month and I am so sad of this nerf :/
My kog isn't OP, why nerf :( :(

With runaan's hurricane i don't think it will affect her too much because you have so much attack speed and Kayle will be useful even when behind because of the utility it provides to the team. I believe this nerf is targeted at sated devourer vayne instead of kayle because that true damage proc is just too op.
Nah not to Vayne, to Kindred.
Nah man , Kayle is pretty Op, I dont think the nerf will bug her at all, {{champion:10}}
